name: Ashes (itch) (Hadryel)
description: A young girl and her dog brave the chaos of a city on fire on their way home. To get through, they will need to work together and help each other. A game made for Global Game Jam 2019 - Theme: What home means to you. Made by: Bruna Negrelli de Andrade, Hadryel Holanda, João Biondo, Maria Luiza Menin, Philippe Moro.
